name: Kubernetes
description: Kubernetes (k8s) is a popular container orchestration system for cloud-native software. It can be deployed across many cloud providers, on bare metal, and almost anywhere in-between.

dimensions.name: Data Collection
dimensions.description: Using the OpenTelemetry Collector distribution for k8s, it's fairly straightforward to collect metrics and logs from your pods using traditional techniques like ServiceMonitor resources.

dimensions.name: Data Processing
dimensions.description: K8s data tends to be highly structured, so minimal processing is usually required â€“ and there are more common solutions for transforming k8s data as needed.

dimensions.name: Data Export
dimensions.description: Since the OTel Collector is well-integrated into the k8s environment, adding new export destinations is as easy as updating a configuration file or deploying some new collectors

dimensions.name: Zero-Code/Agents
dimensions.description: The OpenTelemetry Operator for k8s includes a convenient automatic instrumentation custom resource, allowing for deployment of zero-code agents to pods. In addition, the otel distro includes log and metric parsers for existing k8s workloads.

dimensions.name: OOTB Experience
dimensions.description: There's a variety of pre-built dashboards and alerts available for k8s workloads using OTel semantics.
